header.title: Your Name
header.description: Two teenagers find themselves swapping bodies and must find a way to meet each other.

list.title: Anohana
list.description: Five teenagers reunite to help their friend Menma pass on to the afterlife.

list.title: Death Parade
list.description: Decim judges the dead in a bar where they must play games to determine their fate.

list.title: Vinland Saga
list.description: Thorfinn seeks revenge against Askeladd for his father's death.

list.title: Chihayafuru
list.description: Chihaya Ayase aspires to become the best karuta player in Japan.
